entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Apsley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 7:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -7.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -9.6°C
Wind: SW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. A few flurries beginning early in the evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
